summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2001 FORD F150.  THE CONTACT STATED THAT FOUR SPARK PLUGS FAILED AND WERE BLOWN INTO THE COIL PACK.  THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE FAILURE CAUSED THE VEHICLE TO STALL WITHOUT WARNING.  THE MANUFACTURER WAS CONTACTED BUT PROVIDED NO ASSISTANCE.  THE VEHICLE WAS NOT REPAIRED. THE VIN WAS NOT AVAILABLE. THE CURRENT AND FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 113,000.
